casebody.data:
MEINCK
v.
CITY OF GASTONIA 130PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Thomas D. Bumgardner, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Meinck, Joan A. Martha Raymond Thompson, Attorney at Law, Gastonia, Ryan L. Bostic, Attorney at Law, Aaron C. Low, Attorney at Law, Gastonia, for City of Gastonia. Andrew J. Santaniello, Attorney at Law, Kimberly S. Hibbard, General Counsel, Gregory F. Schwitzgebel, III, Associate General Counsel, for N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 16th of August 2017 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."

Plaintiff-Appellee shall have up to and including the 9th day of October 2017 to file and serve his/ her brief with this Court.
